title: Bad Image
body:
libcrypto-1_1.dll is either not designed to run on windows or it conains an error
help?
i have windows 10
ps: i ve tried hextech repair tool, and it crashes, and i can t find lol.launcher.admin
pss: i ve tried reinstalling lol, doesn t seem to fix anything

replies.body: The repair tool is a good step, but your settings might be blocking your game files from installing or being accessed properly.  Go over the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide first to make sure that block is removed.  Then try the repair tool again!

thanks, but i repaired it
just needed to replace some folders
What folders did u replace? I have the same problem and ive tried a few different ways of fixing it and none have worked...
